app.title: FMToolsV2
app.subtitle: Evaluation Tools for Football Manager 26
app.welcome: Welcome to the player and staff evaluation tool
app.description: After numerous tests on Football Manager in recent years, Kinito and DoctorDim have allowed us to understand important aspects of the game in depth. Using their work for the community, I was able to create this small tool that will help you better understand the management of your squad and your club.
app.tools_intro: Here are 4 small tools that summarize and use their work to simplify our gaming experience:
app.based_on: Based on the work of Gilgiltsu, Kinito & DoctorDim

footer.based_on: Based on work by Gilgiltsu, Kinito & DoctorDim

hidden_notes.title: Hidden Attributes
hidden_notes.description: Evaluate a player's hidden attributes using: Personality, Media Handling, Determination
hidden_notes.professionalism_desc: A player's attitude in all aspects of football. It is reflected in their training attendance, on-pitch behavior, rigor, and adherence to the coach's philosophy. This is the most important attribute for a player's development.
hidden_notes.pressure_desc: A player's ability to cope with expectations (from the club, supporters, coach, media...). The bigger your club, the greater the pressure. Players who can handle it are the best fits for your squad, especially in major competitions.
hidden_notes.temperament_desc: A player's ability to react when their back is against the wall. When your team is losing or struggling, players with strong temperament don't give up; they stay calm and try to motivate their teammates. They often unlock difficult situations.
hidden_notes.ambition_desc: Desire to play for the best clubs at the highest possible salary. Ambitious players tend to ask for more money and may demand a transfer if the club's objectives don't match theirs. Ambition has a low impact on youth development.
hidden_notes.loyalty_desc: A player's loyalty to their club. The most loyal players are less likely to be swayed by bigger clubs and will stand by you if you refuse a transfer. They will also give everything for their team.
hidden_notes.sportsmanship_desc: A player's tendency to maintain a sporting spirit in all circumstances. Less sporting players may try to waste time but receive more cards. Those with better sportsmanship tend to be more popular.
hidden_notes.controversy_desc: A player's tendency to confront you when they disagree with you or your message. Only one media report indicates high controversy (Outspoken), so it's best to avoid it, but it's not necessarily a deal-breaker if you can manage your dressing room and have results.
hidden_notes.projects_subtitle: Only projects that affect hidden attributes are shown
hidden_notes.project_short_term_playtime: Short-term project related to playing time
hidden_notes.project_long_term_playtime: Long-term project related to playing time
hidden_notes.project_trophy: Project to win a trophy with the team
hidden_notes.project_captain: Hopes to become team captain one day

staff.title: Staff Evaluation
staff.description: Evaluate staff to best meet your needs. In FM26, attributes are displayed with descriptive words.

reports.title: Understanding Reports
reports.description: Interpret different reports: Scout, Coach, Individual Training
reports.adaptability_no_issues: Should have no problems adapting to life abroad
reports.adaptability_adapt_easily: Could easily adapt to life in a foreign country
reports.adaptability_fairly_well: Would adapt fairly well in a new country
reports.adaptability_little_problems: Would probably have problems going abroad at such a young age
reports.adaptability_difficulties: Would have difficulty adapting to a new country at such a young age
reports.hidden_effects_intro: These events are often linked to your dressing room hierarchy and team leaders, which is why it is important to pay attention to the personality and media handling (i.e. hidden attributes) of your most influential players.
reports.coaching_positive: The overall atmosphere of the coaching group has had a POSITIVE effect recently
reports.team_spirit_positive: The general spirit of the squad has had a POSITIVE effect on him recently
reports.welcome_positive: The welcome he received has had a POSITIVE effect on his state of mind
reports.playtime_positive: His playing time has had a POSITIVE effect on him recently
reports.coaching_negative: The LESS POSITIVE aspects of the coaching group have been felt recently
reports.team_spirit_negative: The LESS POSITIVE aspects of the squad have been felt recently
reports.welcome_negative: The welcome he received has had a NEGATIVE effect on his state of mind
reports.contract_complacency: Seems to be showing complacency since signing a new contract
reports.success_complacency: Seems to be showing complacency since recent success (rare)
reports.higher_level_experience: Has gained experience at a higher level than before
reports.plus_one_hidden: +1 in one or more hidden attributes
reports.minus_one_hidden: -1 in one or more hidden attributes
reports.minus_two_to_five: -2 to -5 in Professionalism, Ambition and Loyalty

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Values
infrastructure.description: Know and evaluate your club's infrastructure development.
